About.paragraph: Hi, my name is Maximillian Kwun-Tran. Welcome to my domain. Expressing creativity and individuality through my work is my passion. In 2020, I founded my own barbershop in San Jose, CA. While I was building the website for the shop, I discovered my affinity for software development.
About.paragraph2: Although the shop was thriving, I found myself on many nights pondering and exploring the wonderful world of computer science. After almost two years, I decided that I wanted to pursue a development career full time, with hopes of someday founding my own startup. In the fall of 2022, I realized my shops full potential through a successful sale, and began a new chapter.
About.paragraph3: Life after graduation has been nothing short of an exciting roller coaster. I have had the opportunity to meet so many amazing people along the way. I want to give a special thanks to my clients and all those who have supported me throughout my career. If you're reading this, please don't ever hesitate to reach out and connect.
About.paragraph5: P.S. Got something big in development right now. See 'Shapes' in the Project section for a preview...

Appointments.paragraph: I still cut hair part time. Book an appointment below!
